faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Services

questions.question: What makes your medical services different from local providers?
questions.answer: We offer the same quality of care as European hospitals but at significantly reduced costs. Our partner facilities are internationally accredited and our specialists often have international training, providing world-class care in a more affordable setting.

questions.question: How do I choose the right specialist for my procedure?
questions.answer: After your initial consultation, our medical coordinators will match you with specialists based on your specific needs, medical history, and preferences. We provide detailed profiles of our doctors and can arrange video consultations before your visit.

questions.question: Are your medical facilities internationally accredited?
questions.answer: Yes, all our partner hospitals and clinics hold international accreditations such as JCI (Joint Commission International) or equivalent certifications. This ensures they meet the highest global standards for patient safety and care quality.

questions.question: What if I need additional procedures or complications arise?
questions.answer: Our comprehensive packages include provisions for unforeseen circumstances. If additional procedures are needed, we'll discuss options and costs transparently. All our partner facilities have emergency protocols and specialist teams ready to handle complications.

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.subtitle: Tell us about your medical goals. A coordinator will respond with treatment options and a cost estimate.

message.label: Your Message
message.placeholder: Please describe your medical needs, questions, or any specific treatments you're interested in...

privacy.consent: By submitting, you agree to be contacted regarding your inquiry.
privacy.policy: Your data will be processed according to our Privacy Policy

questions.question: How quickly will I receive a response after submitting my inquiry?
questions.answer: Our team typically responds within 24-48 business hours. For urgent matters, please indicate so in your message, and we'll prioritize your inquiry.

questions.question: Do I need to provide my medical records when contacting you?
questions.answer: Not initially. After our first consultation, our medical team will advise what records are needed for a proper assessment of your case and treatment options.

questions.question: Can you arrange video consultations with doctors before I travel?
questions.answer: Yes, we can arrange virtual consultations with your chosen specialist before you commit to traveling. This helps ensure you're comfortable with your doctor and treatment plan.

questions.question: How do I get a cost estimate for my treatment?
questions.answer: After reviewing your medical information, we'll provide a detailed cost breakdown including the procedure, hospital stay, medications, follow-up care, and any additional services you request.

questions.question: Is there a fee for your consultation services?
questions.answer: Initial consultations and treatment coordination services are complimentary. Our fees are included in the overall treatment package once you decide to proceed.
